name: The Final Few
description:
The Final Few is my first game, I am 17 years old and I started this project on March 13th 2019 with a deadline of June 1st 2019.

The game is nearing its release and I am very exited to have people playing it.

The game follows a story of 2 brothers who are the last elves in existence as humans have hunted the rest to extinction.

They come across others seeking the same revenge and form an unlikely family.

The party must work together to have revenge against the Citadel, an army controlled by The King. The Citadel are responsible for the deaths of thousands, including the last of the elves except our hero's.

The game has entirely custom tile-sets and sprites made by me alone, the game also has custom music and an entirely original story.
